summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A TEGOL MOTORCYCLE HELMET, MODEL: V5-05 AND SIZE: SMALL. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17E015000 (EQUIPMENT). THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 866-371-0281 MULTIPLE TIMES AND LEFT THE REQUIRED VOICEMAIL FOR A CALL BACK, BUT THERE HAS BEEN NO RESPONSE. THE CONTACT FELT THAT A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME HAS PASSED FOR THE RECALL REMEDY. THE CONTACT DID NOT EXPERIENCE A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
